verbs.description: if [ARG1: the dow] [V: dropped] [ARG2: 22] [ARGM-ADV: like it did in 1987] it would mean a loss of more than 5 700 points today friday marks the 31st anniversary of black monday by far the worst day ever in the u s stock market on that day the dow plummeted 22 6 percent or 507 99 points at the time if that kind of plunge were to happen today the point loss would be far worse jc parets founder 22 dow chemical company u s dow
